::: callout-note
[Dash](https://plotly.com/dash/) is a productive Python framework for building web applications.
:::

In the video below, we'll discuss how to:

-   Access VS Code withing Posit Workbench

-   Create a new directory and initialize a virtual environment using `venv`

-   Pull in a Dash application from GitHub

-   Deploy Dash application to Posit Connect using the `rsconnect-python` package.

You can find more instructions on deploying Dash applications on our [Posit Connect User Guide](https://docs.posit.co/connect/user/dash/).
